entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A follower of the Dark Lord, identified by a burned sign on their body.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The leader of the Death Eaters, who has the power to summon them with his touch.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A former Death Eater who has returned and is feared by the Dark Lord.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A member of Dumbledore's staff, with a burned sign on his arm.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The leader of the staff, who is being questioned by Fudge.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A government official who is skeptical of Dumbledore's staff.

relationships.description: The Dark Lord can summon Death Eaters with his touch.
Karkaroff fears the Dark Lord's vengeance.
Snape is a member of Dumbledore's staff.
Fudge is questioning Dumbledore about his staff.
